name: Spicy Mussels With Mexican Seasonings
keywords: appetizer, main course, cilantro leaves, dry white wine, extra virgin olive oil, jalapeño, lime juice, mussels, shellfish, tomato
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 cups finely chopped fresh ripe tomato

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan large enough to hold the mussels with room to spare heat three tablespoons of the oil. Add the onion, scallions and garlic and saute over low heat until tender.
Add the tomatoes and jalapeno peppers and bring to a simmer. Stir in the mussels and add the wine. Return to a simmer, cover and cook over medium heat until the mussels have opened, about 10 minutes.
Remove the mussels to individual bowls, discarding any that have not opened. Add the lime juice and coriander to the sauce, pour over the mussels and serve.
